originalTitle: Banknote bouquets could land you in jail, Kenya's central bank warns
title: Banknote bouquets could land you in jail, Kenya's central bank warns
content: Those defacing the currency could face seven years in jail, the central bank says ahead of Valentine's Day.

originalTitle: Shanties in a Lagos lagoon: Bulldozed and burnt
title: Shanties in a Lagos lagoon: Bulldozed and burnt
content: Residents suspect the demolitions are aimed at gentrifying the waterfront in Nigeria's biggest city, but officials deny this.

originalTitle: Ghana suspends citizenship process for people of African descent
title: Ghana suspends citizenship process for people of African descent
content: Since 2016, those who can prove their ancestors came from Africa have been able to get Ghanaian nationality.

originalTitle: US abandoning the SDF has impacted Kurds across the region
title: US abandoning the SDF has impacted Kurds across the region
content: The US is seen with growing suspicion within Kurdish communities and elites, which is changing political calculations.

originalTitle: Son of Norway’s crown princess denies rape as trial opens
title: Son of Norway’s crown princess denies rape as trial opens
content: Marius Borg Hoiby, son of Crown Princess Mette-Marit, faces 38 counts centred on alleged abuse of women.

originalTitle: Syrian army enters Kurdish city of Hasakah as ceasefire takes hold
title: Syrian army enters Kurdish city of Hasakah as ceasefire takes hold
content: Syrian and Kurdish forces begin cooperation to stabilise northeastern Syria under a US-backed ceasefire agreement.

originalTitle: Clintons agree to testify on Epstein as vote looms to hold them in contempt of Congress
title: Clintons agree to testify on Epstein as vote looms to hold them in contempt of Congress
content: The couple bows to the House Oversight Committee's demands after arguing for months that its subpoenas were invalid.

originalTitle: Paris prosecutors raid France offices of Elon Musk's X
title: Paris prosecutors raid France offices of Elon Musk's X
content: The Paris prosecutor says its cyber-crime unit is conducting a search of X's offices.

originalTitle: Russia ends 'week-long pause' with major attack on Ukraine energy sites
title: Russia ends 'week-long pause' with major attack on Ukraine energy sites
content: The attack - which reportedly consisted of more than 70 missiles and 450 drones - comes after a so-called "energy truce" expired at the weekend.

originalTitle: Palace criticised for 'messing' with McNeil mental health
title: Palace criticised for 'messing' with McNeil mental health
content: Dwight McNeil's partner criticises Crystal Palace for "messing" with his mental health after the collapse of his transfer from Everton.

originalTitle: 'Strong and smart' - Liverpool's £60m man, who can 'become like Van Dijk'
title: 'Strong and smart' - Liverpool's £60m man, who can 'become like Van Dijk'
content: Jeremy Jacquet will join Liverpool for £60m from Rennes in the summer - but why are the Reds signing him?

originalTitle: Infantino 'infantile' for wanting to lift Russia ban
title: Infantino 'infantile' for wanting to lift Russia ban
content: Ukraine's sports minister calls Fifa president Gianni Infantino "irresponsible" and "infantile" for saying it will look at lifting a ban on Russia.
